가능성 있는 에러 목록 _ FIN

1. displacement scaling (velocity문제) -OK
2. boundary check 안되어있음 (penetration to the external boundary) -!
3. cfl 컨디션 체크 되고 있는지? -OK

확인한 에러
1. timstep size가 0.06 ~ 1.4 까지 sensitivity크기에 따라 크게 변화함
단순히 same step으로 돌리려면 계산상 부담감이 있을 듯

* 아래의 2nd col.이 lambda값.
(0, -0.13820131347081557, -0.06616870628102214, 5217.5315007539166, 0.8588672880067441)
(1, -0.21240526794540573, -0.1399229062622426, 5111.0244624047136, 0.8548725604001903)
(2, -0.3388598426802194, -0.2731115496105252, 5039.9219072563337, 0.8447443411518756)
(3, -0.3994117772083795, -0.3169955906140383, 4995.1220738513157, 0.8324314434731247)
(4, -0.5535996431474738, -0.4353190858532745, 4968.8013094089874, 0.8143883898821422)
(5, -0.4976896122625587, -0.20957571733030592, 4979.7556229454785, 0.8111998888460247)
(6, -0.742521170778941, -0.49339609043751576, 4914.3841870512279, 0.7926436338234453)
(7, -0.9672607638200833, -0.6701497250739852, 4939.3082044924113, 0.7645533575482654)
(8, -1.0562964899410254, -0.5216289753809169, 5006.6085192157634, 0.7497534781430137)
(9, -1.4235500082492405, -0.6901983062570007, 5002.1127243250285, 0.7300427245813733)
(10, -1.0022312894661143, -0.6902276068814632, 5020.69738806032, 0.6987040946541728)
(11, -1.714812978709364, -0.6859717411200854, 5167.6654724591426, 0.6891885430050414)
(12, -0.42088526019913725, -0.49459302967945135, 5125.3318591635461, 0.6587037076392054)
(13, -1.1438011228141898, -0.6384192719508918, 5367.5962061463861, 0.637671623909151)
(14, -1.1059130113021722, -0.7803709788522113, 5389.320058563867, 0.6041084451777433)
(15, -0.9289254031364215, -0.7284875974691227, 5558.3377978449189, 0.5729078968316342)
(16, -0.2124823155773062, -0.38548817582190714, 5750.2583069211241, 0.5472405468138575)
(17, -0.7586798966276087, -0.4959955350923665, 5992.469551580105, 0.5384919890623094)
(18, -0.5760158933998495, -0.6008472193121791, 6003.2146130843566, 0.5110552159351995)
(19, -0.6508258043015603, -0.5877064602372132, 6281.2498468433487, 0.49361435203969867)
(20, -0.06312372068339075, 8.941264221761104e-05, 6435.7497626610939, 0.4972672767433377)

* velocity 계산시에 timestep을 미리 나눠서 곱해주는 방법도 있을 것같다.
update() function에서 고려해볼것

2. boundary 도달시에 fix시켜주는 function이 빠져있음. 추가로 도입해야
(아래는 해당 code snippet)
             // If node is on domain boundary.
            if (mesh.nodes[node].isDomain)
            {
                // Enforce boundary condition.
                if (signedDistance[node] > 0)
                    signedDistance[node] = 0;
            }

            // Reset the number of boundary points.
            mesh.nodes[node].nBoundaryPoints = 0;
 
* 내부적으로 reinitialization 계속 수행해야 narrow-band에서 어긋나는 문제 해결 가능
(아래는 해당 code snippet)
        // Check mine nodes.
        for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nMines; i++)
        {
            // Boundary is within one grid spacing of the mine.
            if (std::abs(signedDistance[mines[i]]) < 1.0)
            {
                // Reinitialise the signed distance function.
                reinitialise();

                return true;
            }
        }


## 결론 (todolist)
1. 일정 시간 돌리고 의무적으로 reinitialize해주도록 코드 수정 (phi 자체 변화
2. boundary node 수정 (isDomain 체크해야.)
